title: Moongil Kaadugale Song Lyrics Samurai
stanzas:
Moongil kaadugale
Vandu munangum paadalgale
Thoorach sigarangalil
Thanneer thuvaikkum arivigale(2)

Iyarkkai thaayin
Madiyil pirandhu
Ippadi vazha idhayam
Tholaindhu.
Salithu ponen
Manithanaai pirandhu
Parakka vendum
Paravayaai thirindhu
Thirindhu parandhu
Parandhu

Moongil kaadugale
Vandu munangum paadalgale
Thoorach sigarangalil
Thanneer thuvaikkum arivigale

Saetru thanneeril
Malarum sivappu thaamaraiyum.
Saerum manapathail
Poovum jeevan manakkiradhu

Vaerai aruthaalum
Marangalin veruppai
Umizhvadhillai.
Arutha nadhiyin Mel
Marangal aanandha poochariyum

Thamarai poovaai maareno
Jenma saabal engae kaaneno
Maramaai naanum maareno
En manidha piraviyil uyyaeno

Moongil kaadugale
Vandu munangum paadalgale
Thoorach sigarangalil
Thanneer thuvaikkum aarivigale
Uppu kadalodu megam
Urpathi aanaalum.
Uppu thanneerai megam
Oru podhum sindhaadhu.

Mazhayil vilundhaalum
Sooriyan marithu povathillai.
Nilavukku oliyooti thannai
Neetithu kolgiradhe.

Sooriyan polave maareno
En jothiyil ulagai aaleno.

Janam maranam ariyaa vannam
Naanum mazhai thuli aaveno ..

Moongil kaadugale
Vandu munangum paadalgale
Thoorach sigarangalil
Thanneer thuvaikkum arivigale

Iyarkkai thaayin
Madiyil pirandhu
Ippadi vazha idhayam
Tholaindhu.
Salithu ponen
Manithanaai pirandhu
Parakka vendum
Paravayaai thirindhu
Thirindhu parandhu
